data.title: The Pulp Super-Fan
data.meta_description: Commentary from the den of a pulp super-fan
data.text:
Stormgate Press, publisher of Captain Hawklin and Pulp Reality, has started a new series of booklets called “Quick Reads.” All are written by Charles F. Millhouse, who is the man behind Stormgate. These are short, digest-size booklets...

Read More

And we conclude my deeper re-read of the B.P.R.D Omnibus series, which is part of the Hellboy Universe. I won’t repeat everything I said about the B.P.R.D., so read the...
